version_description:
- Improved French, Italian and Ukrainian
- Fixed a bug in the list of items
- Fixed the year of opening of some elements
- Fixed discoverer of Einsteinium
- Improved the table of elements
- Improved item viewing screen
and many other changes
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

- Improved English, French, Chinese, Serbian, Polish, Turkish and other languages
- Improved Solubility Table
- Fixed discoverer - Neodymium
- Fixed the distribution of oxygen in the ocean
- Fix the number of neutrons - Hafnium
- Faulty block - Lutetia
- Improved isotope list
- Open the list of isotopes when viewing the item
- Improved item viewing screen
and many other changes
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

- Improved Chinese, English, Polish, Japanese and Korean
- Fixed the valence of all elements
- Fixed the group - Lead and Astat
- Improved table - Electrochemical series
- Corrected the names of some of the elements in Latin
- Added more isotopes - Actinium
- Improved work with isotopes
- Fixed phantom clicks in the table
- Fixed a bug when clicking on Actinides
- Added iPad support [Beta]
App in the AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1451726577
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

- Added translation into 15 languages
- Fixed the aggregative state of some elements
- Fixed bismuth group
- Fixed the display of groups when reading
- Improved Polish
- Added the discoverer Holmium
- Improved mail handling
- Fixed Wolfram in Spanish
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

- Improved Portuguese, Turkish, Japanese and German
- Fixed Electronic configuration of some elements
- Fixed the number of neutrons Bismuth
- Corrected description of Li
- More Cesium isotopes
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

Fixed bug when opening items
Improved some vocabulary terms
Added over 1000 isotopes
Isotope search by element symbol
Improved Greek
Improved some tables
Improved search
Improved item viewing screen
many other minor changes
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

Fixed electronic configuration of some elements
Updated French, Chinese, Portuguese, Ukrainian, Polish, German and other languages.
Improved Solubility Table
Improved search and listing
Fixed chlorine bug
and much more in this update
With each update, the app gets better, if you like the app, please take a few minutes to leave a review)

- Improved translation of many languages: English, Russian, Persian, Spanish, French, Chinese, Japanese and many others
- Improved display of texts, increased font size
- Fixed block - Lutetium and Lawrence
- Fixed electronic configuration of some elements
- Improved list with items
- Fixed a problem with colors during the search
- Improved application stability
and much more in this update
